ELEMENT.HELP:
It is important that you use your website as a tool to develop your Company Image. A good Company Image will increase the percieved value of your services, and also increase the likelihood the customer will remember your company in the future.

Recommended Topics:
  • What makes you unique?
  • Do you employ any experts?
  • Are you a leader in your field? (why?)
  • How long have you been in business?
  • Have you won any awards recently?
  • Do you have any dealer authorizations (make sure you have permission to use trademarks!)
  • Are there any special ingredients/components that go into your products?

       Try to be concise, you should pick 2 or 3 topics and only cover those, remember if its too long most visitors will not read it!
